channel.title: Need help with custom item
channel.description:
ok so i have been making my own item for like the past week detailing it and everything and im pretty sure im done now but i want to release it and put it in game but i dont know how to do that
i got as far as making it a .dat if that is even needed
any tips?
search or google doesnt help me at all :(

item.title: Need help with custom item
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

ok but what about the model? how do i know what model number? or do i make my own number up?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with custom item
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

If its a weapon, go to your class8.java and do ctrl+F then search for bandos godsword, copy that int and the bracket after it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with custom item
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

how do i do the ints part because this is really my first time

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with custom item
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Linksys Mr. Linksys
item.description:
@Mr_Linksys wrote:

Make your file a .dat
get GZip
GZip your file
Put it into your clients model folder
Go to class8.java and add your int
compile
log into your server using your client
say add model #### (#### being the model id)
exit out your client and server
compiler your client
run your client and server
and voila.

Read full topic
